messages.content: It is a privilege for me to be your Brexit Party candidate in the General Election. I am not a career politician. I work in financial services in the City. I campaigned to Leave the EU in the referendum, and ever since I have been fighting to uphold that decision. For three and a half years opposition has been unrelenting from the well-funded Remain lobby and our political elite. The vote to Leave was the largest ever vote in the UK's history, and by deliberate obstruction it is not being delivered. This is indeed the Brexit election, but more importantly this is about defending democracy itself. Regardless of how you voted in 2016, the Leave vote must be enacted, otherwise what majority decision will be safe?

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Abolish the unaccountable and unelected House of Lords.
Address corruption at both local and national levels.
Restore control over borders, laws, and money.
We must control our laws, borders, money, and defence.
Keep investing, better management, less waste.
Spend £200bn on transport and jobs in the regions.
We need a fair, firm points-based system.

issues.brexitEurope: I campaigned to Leave the EU in the referendum, and ever since I have been fighting to uphold that decision. The vote to Leave was the largest ever vote in the UK's history, and by deliberate obstruction it is not being delivered. This is indeed the Brexit election, but more importantly this is about defending democracy itself. Regardless of how you voted in 2016, the Leave vote must be enacted, otherwise what majority decision will be safe?
issues.governance: Fundamental Democratic Reform - Make Parliament serve the people.
issues.government: Radical political reform including abolishing the unaccountable and unelected House of Lords.
issues.health: Supporting the NHS - keep investing, better management, less waste.
issues.immigration: Controlled immigration - we need a fair, firm points-based system.
issues.transport: A Brexit Dividend - Spend £200bn on transport and jobs in the regions.

community.content: For clearing up corruption in government; local and national.

contactInformation.address: Jumhet House, 160 London Road, Barking, Essex, IG11 8BB
